name: shortcutz
description: A dead-simple yet powerful keyboard shortcuts manager.

scripts.lint: eslint shortcutz.js || echo [sudo] npm i -g eslint
scripts.dist: uglifyjs shortcutz.js -o shortcutz.min.js || echo [sudo] npm i -g uglifyjs
scripts.docs: jsdoc shortcutz.js -d docs || echo [sudo] npm i -g jsdoc

author: Luis Leiva
